entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
